gold: The graph illustrates adidas ' revenue from the first half of 2017 to the first half of 2019 , by region.
In the first half of 2019 , the European region generated a revenue of about 2.97 billion euros for adidas.
In total , the adidas Group generated a global 1st half revenue of approximately 11.4 billion euros in 2019 .
